last_episode_to_air.name: Luvia | Starry Flower
last_episode_to_air.overview: After five years of grief, guilt and pain, Ryu finally faces a new path—a new justice. The Juggernaut should beware.

name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
original_name: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか
overview:
In a world, where the deities have descended from the heavens lies the town of Orario that features the Dungeon, which contains an assortment of monsters from goblins to dragons. Adventurers slay those monsters and take their shards, which are then used to craft magic items. To become an adventurer, people join groups called Familia. Each of which is named after and serves a resident deity. The adventurers and their attributes and abilities are ranked by level, improved by experience and supervised by their Familia's deity.

Bell Cranel, a novice adventurer, is the sole member of the Familia under the goddess Hestia. After being saved by top level adventurer Ais Wallenstein of the Loki Familia, he falls in love with her and decides to improve and become worthy of her attention. All the while mostly unaware that other girls, deities and mortals, also develop feelings for him. Especially Hestia herself.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
Life in the bustling city of Orario is never dull, especially for Bell Cranel, a naïve young man who hopes to become the greatest adventurer in the land. After a chance encounter with the lonely goddess, Hestia, his dreams become a little closer to reality. With her support, Bell embarks on a fantastic quest as he ventures deep within the city's monster-filled catacombs, known only as the "Dungeon." Death lurks around every corner in the cavernous depths of this terrifying labyrinth, and a mysterious power moves amidst the shadows.

Even on the surface, survival is a hard-earned privilege. Indeed, nothing is ever certain in a world where gods and humans live and work together, especially when they often struggle to get along. One thing is for sure, though: a myriad of blunders, triumphs and friendships awaits the dauntlessly optimistic protagonist of this herculean tale.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview:
It is business as usual in the massive city of Orario, where legions of adventurers gather to explore the monster-infested "Dungeon." Among them is the easily flustered yet brave Bell Cranel, the sole member of the Hestia Familia. With the help of his demi-human supporter Liliruca Arde and competent blacksmith Welf Crozzo, Bell has earned the title of Little Rookie by becoming Orario's fastest-growing adventurer thanks to his endeavors within the deeper levels of the Dungeon.

This season continues Bell's adventures as he tries to bring glory to his goddess and protect those he cares about. However, various familias and gods across the city begin to take notice of his achievements and attempt to add him to their ranks.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Hestia Familia faces an unparalleled crisis when Bell encounters an injured vouivre (dragon-type monster girl) in the Dungeon. . . one who can talk. His decision to protect the girl, who will come to be called Weine, upends everything he and his familia thought they understood about monsters and threatens to put them at odds with Orario as a whole. But Weine is just part of greater schemes concerning talking monsters, schemes which Hestia Familia will soon find themselves at the heart of.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Intrepid adventurer Bell Cranel has leveled up, but he can’t rest on his dungeoneering laurels just yet. The Hestia Familia still has a long way to go before it can stand toe-to-toe with the other Familias of Orario — but before Bell can set out on his next mission, reports of a brutal murder rock the adventuring community! One of Bell’s trusted allies stands accused of the horrible crime, and it’s up to Bell and his friends to clear their name and uncover a nefarious plot brewing in the dungeon’s dark depths.

episodes.name: (Bell Cranel) Adventurer
episodes.overview: The Labyrinth city of Orario has a massive dungeon at its heart, filled with terrifying beasts. A new adventurer, Bell Crannel, challenges this perilous labyrinth, but not in hopes of finding treasure, but in hopes of picking up a girl.

episodes.name: (Monsterphilia) Monster Festival
episodes.overview: Bell Crannel's power grows rapidly thanks to his ability, Realis Phrase. As long as he's in love with a girl, it will continue to make him stronger. His goddess, Hestia, is jealous that the girl he's in love with isn't her, but still wants to support him. She goes to another goddess and asks her to make him a powerful sword.

episodes.name: (Hestia Knife) The Blade of a God
episodes.overview: "I don't want to lose any more of my family." Bell and Hestia are attacked by an escaped monster during Monster Philia. Bell fights to save the only family he has left, but is overwhlemed by the monster.

episodes.name: (Supporter) The Weak
episodes.overview: "Excuse me, are you looking for a supporter?" After his rapid growth, Bell reaches the 7th floor of the dungeon. He gets new equipment and is ready to go when a girl named Lilika approaches him. She is a supporter, and her job is to aide adventurers in the dungeon.

episodes.name: (Grimoire) Magic Book
episodes.overview: With Lili's help, Bell is progressing further into the dungeon than ever. Since he can focus on the fights, he can make more money. But Lili has a secret: she despises adventurers, and is waiting for a chance to trick Bell.

episodes.name: (Liliruca Arde) Reason
episodes.overview: Lili leads Bell deep into a dungeon and abandons him. He's alone and surrounded by larger monsters than he's ever faced. She runs off with his knife and makes for the exit, but her guild mates are waiting for her.

episodes.name: (Aiz Wallenstein) Sword Princess
episodes.overview: At Bell's urging, Hestia reluctantly lets Lili into the party. Bell, worried about his weakness as he continues to go deeper into the dungeons, accepts an offer of help from Aiz Wallenstein, the girl he loves.

episodes.name: (Argonaut) Wanting To Be A Hero
episodes.overview: For an adventurer to level up, and truly get stronger, he has to go on an adventure. Bell travels down to the lowest of the upper floors of the dungeon, where he encounters a minotaur with a giant sword. Lili is badly injured, and Bell is unable to leave her behind. Aiz arrives again to save him, but he waves her off...

episodes.name: (Welf Crozzo) Blacksmith
episodes.overview: Bell defeats the minotaur and becomes the fastest adventurer to level up in history. After his success, Bell is given the nickname "Little Rookie." As he sets his sights on the middle floors of the dungeon, Ryuu tells him that if he wants to succeed, he's going to need a bigger party.

episodes.name: (Pass Parade) Procession of Monsters
episodes.overview: The party is exploring on the middle floors when another group leads a huge train of monsters to them. They're overwhelmed and caught in a cave-in. Cut off from the upper floors, with limited supplies and little strength left, they are forced to make a desperate attempt to reach the safe zone even deeper in the dungeon.

episodes.name: (Under Resort) Labyrinth Utopia
episodes.overview: After a great struggle, Bell and his party finally reach the 18th floor. Aiz Wallenstein and the Loki Familia are already there, returning from their expedition to the lowest levels of the dungeon. With the danger passed, they enjoy a short break before they head back up to the town.

episodes.name: (Show) Evil Intentions
episodes.overview: A massive floor boss has crashed down from the upper floors and begun tearing apart the adventurers. Aiz has left for the surface, and it's up to Bell and his friends to defeat the monster. With their escape route cut off, it's do or die if they ever want to see the light of the sun again.

episodes.name: (Familia Myth) The Story of a Familia
episodes.overview: A massive floor boss falls from above and traps the adventurers. The only way out is up, and to get back home Bell will have to defeat it without Aiz's help.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview:
Life in the bustling city of Orario is never dull, especially for Bell Cranel, a naïve young man who hopes to become the greatest adventurer in the land. After a chance encounter with the lonely goddess, Hestia, his dreams become a little closer to reality. With her support, Bell embarks on a fantastic quest as he ventures deep within the city's monster-filled catacombs, known only as the "Dungeon." Death lurks around every corner in the cavernous depths of this terrifying labyrinth, and a mysterious power moves amidst the shadows.

Even on the surface, survival is a hard-earned privilege. Indeed, nothing is ever certain in a world where gods and humans live and work together, especially when they often struggle to get along. One thing is for sure, though: a myriad of blunders, triumphs and friendships awaits the dauntlessly optimistic protagonist of this herculean tale.

episodes.name: (Party) Banquet of the Gods
episodes.overview: Bell's back with a new adventure! When the powerful leader of the Apollo Familia takes notice of him, his life with his Goddess is under threat.

episodes.name: (Apollo) Sun God
episodes.overview: Apollo Familia has laid down their challenge, but Hestia refuses. Apollo tries to force her hand...

episodes.name: (Conversion) Gathering
episodes.overview: Bell goes to train for the War Game, and it's up to the rest of the party to rescue Lili. Hestia puts her plan into action, but Lili refuses to leave the Soma Familia.

episodes.name: (War Game) War Game
episodes.overview: It's time for the War Games, and the Hestia Family, and its new members, are ready. Can they defeat the entire Apollo Familia and save Bell from Apollo's clutches?

episodes.name: (Home) The Hearthfire Mansion
episodes.overview: The Hestia Familia was victorious in their battle against Apollo, and now they've won a huge mansion and a giant pile of cash! Hestia sets out to recruit for the Familia, but there's something she's forgetting...

episodes.name: (Ishtar Familia) City of Lust
episodes.overview: Bell is caught up in a new adventure that takes him to the seedy underbelly of Orario: the pleasure quarters.

episodes.name: (Renard) Fox Person
episodes.overview: With the help of Haruhime the Renard, Bell escapes from the Amazoness prostitutes. But he begins to wonder about Haruhime, who says she was forced to be a prostitute against her will and isn't worth being saved.

episodes.name: (Ephemeral Dreams) Killing Stone
episodes.overview: Bell decides he's going to get money in the dungeon to purchase Haruhime. But he runs into a trap when the Ishtar Familia decides to kidnap him.

episodes.name: (Barbera) War Prostitutes
episodes.overview: With the true purpose of the ritual and the killing stone revealed, Bell decides that he's going to take any risk to save Haruhime.

episodes.name: (Argonaut) Longing to Be a Hero
episodes.overview: The Ishtar Familia's plan has been found out by Freya, who launches a raid on their home. Just when things are bad enough for Bell, their interference brings even more chaos!

episodes.name: (Rakia) Army's Advance
episodes.overview: With Haruhime safe at the Familia, things begin to calm down. But when Hestia makes a casual pass at Bell and he shuts her down hard, she runs out of the mansion and into the waiting arms of kidnappers!

episodes.name: (Song of Love) Goddess and Child
episodes.overview: Bell and Hestia spend a relaxing few days at a village in the wilderness, and participate in a local festival. Bell ponders what to do about his relationship with his immortal Goddess, and if he really is ready to love her.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview:
It is business as usual in the massive city of Orario, where legions of adventurers gather to explore the monster-infested "Dungeon." Among them is the easily flustered yet brave Bell Cranel, the sole member of the Hestia Familia. With the help of his demi-human supporter Liliruca Arde and competent blacksmith Welf Crozzo, Bell has earned the title of Little Rookie by becoming Orario's fastest-growing adventurer thanks to his endeavors within the deeper levels of the Dungeon.

This season continues Bell's adventures as he tries to bring glory to his goddess and protect those he cares about. However, various familias and gods across the city begin to take notice of his achievements and attempt to add him to their ranks.

episodes.name: (Wiene) A Dragon Girl
episodes.overview: Monsters are evil abominations driven by murderous instinct. But if that were true, why is this one a scared little girl who doesn’t understand why she’s being hunted?

episodes.name: (Monster) A Single Wing
episodes.overview: Who knows what could happen if word of Wiene’s existence spread. The Hestia Familia needs answers and soon, but what they discover in the dungeon only raises more questions...

episodes.name: (Xenos) Heretics
episodes.overview: The Guild knows about Wiene. But instead of demanding answers, it assigns the Hestia Familia a mission they cannot refuse. Something awaits them in the dungeon’s darkness.

episodes.name: (Yearning) A Far-Off-Dream
episodes.overview: There are others like Wiene, and they call themselves Xenos. Uranus asks much from the Hestia Familia, but if anyone can bridge the gap between species, it’s them.

episodes.name: (Ikelos Familia) The King of Calamity
episodes.overview: It was supposed to be the dawning of a new era. But selfish, evil men only care about what they can take for themselves, leaving others to face the consequences.

episodes.name: (Knossos) A Man-Made Labyrinth
episodes.overview: Bell shouldn’t get involved. But the young adventurer has already decided otherwise. Little does he know that he’ll help Fels discover a secret even Uranus doesn’t know.

episodes.name: (Dix Perdix) A Dream of Beasts
episodes.overview: Never underestimate the measures a fanatic will take to prove his worldview correct.

episodes.name: (Bell Cranel) The Fool
episodes.overview: The Loki Familia are battle-hardened veterans used to fighting monsters. But this opponent is different...

episodes.name: (Stigma) Downfall
episodes.overview: Although Ikelos has been successfully scapegoated, public opinion turns on Bell. Helping the Xenos will now prove impossible — but Hermes’ intel might just change the tide.

episodes.name: (Invisible) Forced Breakthrough
episodes.overview: The surface is no longer safe for the Xenos. Now, the Hestia Familia must smuggle them back into the Dungeon. There’s just one problem: The Loki Familia stand in the way.

episodes.name: (Ultra Soul) Decisive Battle
episodes.overview: Bell WILL stay true to his ideals. Even if that means making an enemy of the woman he loves.

episodes.name: (Argonaut) Return of the Hero
episodes.overview: As Hermes finally reveals his true intentions, Bell battles the most powerful opponent he's ever faced.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Hestia Familia faces an unparalleled crisis when Bell encounters an injured vouivre (dragon-type monster girl) in the Dungeon. . . one who can talk. His decision to protect the girl, who will come to be called Weine, upends everything he and his familia thought they understood about monsters and threatens to put them at odds with Orario as a whole. But Weine is just part of greater schemes concerning talking monsters, schemes which Hestia Familia will soon find themselves at the heart of.

episodes.name: Prelude | Night Before Departure
episodes.overview: Gather your party and venture forth, Bell. The dungeon awaits.

episodes.name: The Great Falls | The Great Falls
episodes.overview: Bell and his party are making good time and will soon enter the lower floors. But the dungeon crawl is going too smoothly, and Cassandra cannot shake her earlier premonition.

episodes.name: Parasite | Viscum Album
episodes.overview: The party has two options: either retreat to the surface with the injured or hunt the monster and hope its defeat will dispel the ailment. Both choices carry dire risks.

episodes.name: Mermaid | The Girl of Water City
episodes.overview: The party learns too late that the Moss Huge can use other monsters against them. Meanwhile, Bell is alone, but not without allies; the Xenos have not forgotten his kindness.

episodes.name: Argo Vesta | Heroic Slash of Holy Flame
episodes.overview: Haruhime’s new ability turns the tide of battle, but the Moss Huge has proven that it knows what it’s doing. As the party strategist, Lili has a hard choice to make.

episodes.name: Rabbit's Foot | Rabbit's Foot
episodes.overview: Bell’s exploits have earned him fame and a new alias, and Lili worries that means change is coming. Meanwhile, Ryu left a note for her coworkers and vanished soon afterwards.

episodes.name: Cassandra Ilion | Dream Seer
episodes.overview: Ryu, the Gale Wind, stands accused of murder. Bell and his party need answers, but only Cassandra knows that tragedy will befall them if they pursue their friend.

episodes.name: Mirabilis | Chaos
episodes.overview: Ryu couldn’t be the killer… right? Bell wants to help his friend, but as the body count grows higher, he must ask himself how well he truly knows her.

episodes.name: Lambton | Ill Omen
episodes.overview: While Bell and Ryu contend with Jura and his insidious abilities, the rest of Bell’s allies uncover a barrel of bad apples in the dungeon’s dark depths.

episodes.name: Juggernaut | The Destroyer
episodes.overview: Some monsters you must fight and from others you must flee. But beware the Juggernaut lest you simply cease to be.

episodes.name: Endless | Brutal
episodes.overview: The Juggernaut slaughters its way through a dwindling number of survivors, forcing Ryu to face her demons.

episodes.name: Amphisbaena | A Song of Despair
episodes.overview: With retreat an impossibility, Bell’s party fight for their lives when a Floor Boss spawns early. However, they are all adventurers; they will not die so easily.

episodes.name: Morgue | Victim
episodes.overview: Critically wounded and trapped within the dungeon’s darkened depths, Bell and Ryu’s adventure is over. Their fight for survival has now begun.

episodes.name: Daphne Lauros | Friend
episodes.overview: The boss fight extracts a heavy toll on the party, and they must make a choice. If they go one way, they will live. But if they go the other? They will die.

episodes.name: Ignis | Flame
episodes.overview: The party narrowly survived, and now they must search for their missing friends. However, they’re facing more than just monsters; they’re fighting the Dungeon itself.

episodes.name: Welf Crozzo | Shikou
episodes.overview: Bell and Ryu must cast reservations aside in the face of death. Meanwhile, Welf faces a trial by fire he cannot fail; lives are at stake.

episodes.name: White Palace | White Labyrinth
episodes.overview: Bell and Ryu’s relationship deepens as the trauma of the Deep Floors pushes them past their limits. They have each other, and that is the only reason they’re both still alive.

episodes.name: Desperate | Dungeon Do-or-Die Time
episodes.overview: Hope glimmers in the darkness; the Xenos appear in the party’s hour of need, and Bell and Ryu make steady progress despite all odds. They may all survive this after all.

episodes.name: Colosseum | Combat Arena
episodes.overview: Their luck couldn’t last forever; Bell and Ryu must cross the Colosseum, where monsters constantly respawn. In the end, they may face an impossible choice…

episodes.name: Astrea Familia | Heroic Death
episodes.overview: It is too late for the Astrea Familia. Their story ends in tragedy, and this is the tale of how Ryu's life changed forever on that dark day.

episodes.name: Daydream | A Sweet Lie
episodes.overview: Ryu’s feelings for Bell have changed in a way she cannot quite place. All she knows is that she cannot lose him; she just cannot.

episodes.name: Luvia | Starry Flower
episodes.overview: After five years of grief, guilt and pain, Ryu finally faces a new path—a new justice. The Juggernaut should beware.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Intrepid adventurer Bell Cranel has leveled up, but he can’t rest on his dungeoneering laurels just yet. The Hestia Familia still has a long way to go before it can stand toe-to-toe with the other Familias of Orario — but before Bell can set out on his next mission, reports of a brutal murder rock the adventuring community! One of Bell’s trusted allies stands accused of the horrible crime, and it’s up to Bell and his friends to clear their name and uncover a nefarious plot brewing in the dungeon’s dark depths.
